description.value:
At 3rd level, you gain the ability to twist your spells to suit your needs. You gain three of the following Metamagic options of your choice. You gain another one at 6th, 10th, and 17th levels.

You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless otherwise noted.
